      • initialize

        public void initialize(Context arg0)
                throws SsdkUnsupportedException
        If the device is not supported, Exception will be occured.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface SsdkInterface
        Parameters:
        arg0 - it is context of app. This is performed to initailize the Slook SDK using context of arg0.
        Throws:
        SsdkUnsupportedException - if Device is not samsung device and VERSION_CODES is not L1, exception is occured.

      • isFeatureEnabled

        public boolean isFeatureEnabled(int type)
        Checks whether the feature is supported.
        Specified by:
        isFeatureEnabled in interface SsdkInterface
        Parameters:
        type - integers have meaning of distinction with AIRBUTTON, SMARTCLIP, WRITINGBUDDY and SPEN_HOVER_ICON. check whether the feature are enable or not with variable of integer. [UPDATE] return value is changed.
        Returns:
        true or false.
